name: Cat Grass Cardamom
description:
After the side of the field that this card is on has played 2 Action Cards: Deal 1 Dendro DMG to the active character on that side.
Usage(s): 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After the side of the field that this card is on has played 2 Action Cards:</color> Deal 1 $[K107] to the active character on that side.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After the side of the field that this card is on has played 2 Action Cards:</color> Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color> to the active character on that side.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 2</color>
